finishingPage.heroTitle: Finishing & Interior Design in New Heliopolis
finishingPage.heroSubtitle: We offer custom finishing and interior design services for your projects in New Heliopolis, turning your vision into a tangible reality.
finishingPage.servicesTitle: Start Planning Your Project With Us
finishingPage.servicesSubtitle: Choose the package that suits your current needs, whether you're in the planning stage or ready for execution.
finishingPage.servicesIntro: Our specialized team offers consultation and design services to help you plan your project. If you're looking for execution, you can browse the works of our trusted partners below.
finishingPage.gallerySubtitle: Browse the work of our distinguished partners in finishing and design, and choose the right partner to start your project.
finishingPage.ctaTitle: Do you have a project in New Heliopolis?
finishingPage.ctaSubtitle: If you own a unit in New Heliopolis and want to finish it to the highest quality, contact us today for a free consultation.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions to meet all your real estate needs, from design and decoration to finishing and marketing.
servicesPage.service1Desc: We provide services for selling, buying, and renting residential and commercial properties. We help you list your property on our platform to reach the largest number of potential clients.
servicesPage.service2Desc: We offer integrated solutions for finishing and interior design, from creating designs and accurate estimates to execution and supervision with the highest quality standards.
servicesPage.service3Desc: We design and create unique wall decorations and magnificent art sculptures. We offer a wide range of paintings and artifacts that add an exceptional aesthetic touch to your home or office.

partnersPage.title: Partners in Success
partnersPage.subtitle: Our journey towards excellence is built on trust and collaboration with a selection of the best companies in various fields.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: ONLY HELIO ('we', 'us', 'our', 'the Platform') respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal data when you visit our website and use our services. By using the Platform, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

dataCollection.title: 2. The Data We Collect About You
dataCollection.content:
We may collect and process the following types of information:
- **Personal Data:** Your name, phone number, and email address when you submit a request, register as a partner, or contact us.
- **Property Data:** Details and images you provide when listing a property for sale or rent.
- **Usage Data:** Information about how you access and use the Service, such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent.
- **Cookies:** We use cookies to improve your experience and track activity on our service.

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Personal Data
dataUsage.content:
We use the data we collect for various purposes:
- To provide and maintain our Service, including displaying listings and facilitating communication.
- To manage your account as a partner and facilitate communication with you.
- To forward your requests and inquiries to the relevant partners (developers, finishing companies, etc.).
- To notify you about changes to our Service or policies.
- To analyze usage to improve and develop our platform and services.
- To prevent fraud and ensure the security of the Platform.

dataSharing.title: 4. Disclosures of Your Personal Data
dataSharing.content:
We may share your personal data in the following situations:
- **With Partners:** When you submit a service request or an inquiry about a property, your contact information and request details are shared with the relevant partner (the property lister or service provider) to enable them to contact you.
- **With Service Providers:** We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service (e.g., hosting, data analysis), who may have limited access to your data to perform these tasks on our behalf.
- **For Legal Compliance:** If required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: The security of your data is important to us. We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

changes.title: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'last updated' date at the top. You are advised to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us via the information provided on our 'Contact Us' page.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By using the ONLY HELIO platform (the 'Platform'), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use (the 'Terms'). If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Platform. These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and ONLY HELIO.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: ONLY HELIO is an online platform that acts as an intermediary for listing real estate and related services (such as finishing and decoration) specializing in New Heliopolis city. We facilitate communication between clients seeking properties or services and the providers of those services ('Partners'). Our role is limited to connecting parties, and we are not a party to any agreements or transactions made between users and Partners.

userAccounts.title: 3. Partner Accounts
userAccounts.content: Partners must provide accurate and complete information upon registration. Partners are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and for all activities that occur under their account. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that provide misleading information or violate these Terms.

prohibited.title: 4. Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content: You agree not to use the Platform for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms. This includes, but is not limited to: posting false, misleading, or fraudulent content; infringing upon any party's intellectual property rights; using the Platform in a way that could damage or disrupt it; collecting information about others without their consent.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: The Platform and its entire original contents, features, and functionality (including but not limited to all information, software, text, displays, images, video, and audio) are owned by ONLY HELIO and are protected by copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The service is provided on an 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' basis. We do not warrant the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any information on the platform, including property listings and partner details. You expressly agree that your use of the platform is at your sole risk. We do not guarantee that the platform will be error-free or uninterrupted.

limitation.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall ONLY HELIO, nor its directors, employees, or partners, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, arising out of or in connection with your access to or use of the Platform.

governingLaw.title: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the Arab Republic of Egypt, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, you can contact us via the information provided on our 'Contact Us' page.
